---
title: MAGMA_FLOW
---

MAGMA_FLOW runs gene-based association using MAGMA and generates inputs for PoPS and enrichment.

Key responsibilities

- Map SNPs to genes and run MAGMA gene analyses.
- Produce gene-level association tables.

Important parameters

- `run_magma`, `magma_memory`, `magma_cpus`.

Outputs

- MAGMA gene association files in the `MAGMA` result folder.
